channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Man who threatened bystanders, cops in hospital before police shooting was former NYPD officer
item.description: The suspect barricaded himself in a hospital room with the weapon before cutting himself and threatening to injure others

item.title: Jeffries says DHS Secretary Noem 'should be run out of town' amid ICE shooting backlash
item.description: The top House Democrat is accusing the DHS secretary of "depraved indifference" after an ICE agent shot U.S. citizen Renee Nicole Good during a Minneapolis operation.

item.title: Trump dodges on ICE immunity claim after agent kills Minnesota mother

item.title: Minneapolis Is in Mourning. It’s Also Very, Very Pissed Off
item.description: In the hours after an ICE officer shot and killed Rennee Nicole Good, the city came together — and found a difficult balance of grief and rage.

item.title: Over the top? ICE agent shoots soccer mom, blames ‘domestic terrorism’
item.description: The death of an apparently innocent woman at the hands of immigration police does no favors to the split plaguing American society Read Full Article at RT.com

item.title: Crowd yells ‘cowards!’ after federal agents crash into a car and fire tear gas in Minneapolis
item.description: The scene Monday was just a few blocks from where an immigration officer fatally shot Renee Good last week.

item.title: Manitoba Tories suspend board member over online comments following fatal ICE shooting
item.description: The Tories are distancing themselves from a board member over social media comments he made after a U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent fatally shot an American woman in Minneapolis.

item.title: Billboard next to Southern California highway hijacked with pro-ICE messaging
item.description: A billboard next to a Southern California freeway was hijacked with pro-ICE messaging and a chilling remark about the fatal federal officer-involved shooting of Renee Good.

item.title: Trump Totally Changes Excuse for Why Renee Good Deserved to Get Shot

item.title: Footage shows tense standoff before deadly police shooting in St. Cloud
item.description: Police in Saint Cloud released video of a deadly officer-involved shooting that happened last month.

item.title: 'Constitutional crisis in a nutshell': Lawyer calls out JD Vance's latest 'lie'

item.title: Trump admin sending more agents to Minneapolis despite outrage over fatal shooting
item.description: US Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem says hundreds more federal agents are heading to Minneapolis, brushing aside demands by the city's Democratic leaders to leave after an immigration officer fatally shot a female protester.

item.title: DHS shares new video of minutes before ICE shooting of Renee Good
item.description: New video shows the minutes before an ICE agent shot and killed Renee Good, showing her car partially blocking the street while several cars are able to pass it.

item.title: Anti-ICE protests erupt across Colorado after fatal Minnesota shooting
item.description: Protests over immigration enforcement broke out across Colorado on Saturday after fatal and nonfatal officer-involved shootings in Minneapolis and Portland.

item.title: Tom Emmer pushes back on suggestion that Minnesota anti-ICE protesters have been peaceful

item.title: Legal Expert Analysis: ICE Agent Was Fully in His Rights to Shoot Renee Good
item.description: An ICE agent fatally shot 37-year-old Renee Good inside her vehicle after she obstructed an immigration enforcement operation.

item.title: Married couple shot by federal agents in Portland, FBI investigating

item.title: Cops Are Taught Not to Shoot Into Cars. ICE Keeps Doing It Anyway.
item.description: On Wednesday, a masked federal immigration officer killed Renee Nicole Good, a 37-year-old mother and poet, shooting her at point-blank range in her car. The incident, which has made headlines across the nation, is far from the first time immigration officer…

item.title: Minneapolis: Attempted ramming attack, suspect eliminated
item.description: US officials say an ICE officer shot and killed a suspect who allegedly tried to ram federal agents with a vehicle during an enforcement operation in Minneapolis.

item.title: Man with machete shot and killed by police, who then find 3 more dead inside home: officials
item.description: Police shot and killed an individual armed with a knife in the Garden State on Monday, the New Jersey state attorney general's office noted in a press release.

item.title: Off-duty deputy shot and killed while working security job in Texas, suspect apprehended
